name: Space Survival (itch) (Samu)
description:
Players take on the role of a brave astronaut who is stranded in space and under constant attack from a barrage of incoming meteors.

The objective of the game is to survive for as long as possible by dodging the incoming meteors and destroying as many of them as you can with your laser gun. With each passing second, the intensity of the meteor shower increases, making it more challenging to stay alive.

As you progress through the game, you'll have the opportunity to upgrade your space ship with better weapons and engine to help you survive longer. But be warned, the meteors will also get tougher as you progress, so you'll need to be quick and strategic to stay ahead.

So what are you waiting for? Suit up and take on the ultimate challenge of surviving in space!
